Gastone Pietro Rosati Papini is an Associate Professor in the Department of Industrial Engineering at the University of Trento, with over a decade of experience in advanced control systems and machine learning techniques for autonomous system. His research bridges the fields of applied mechanics, control theory, and machine learning, with a focus on developing intelligent and adaptive models and controllers. Specifically, He aims to integrate classical model-based principles with data-driven techniques to create innovative solutions for model and control physical systems.
